ftbquests.chapter.0C80A5748A662C54.quest: The Shadowlands dimension is a dark shadow dimension, with gray trees and black stones forming the main landscape. Occasionally, you can also see the Red Cactus Forests, where you can find keys to the Glowscreen Forest and Vellium dimensions.
Find a tall tower structure with a light purple portal frame on top, and a nearby box containing the portal igniter.
Kill Golden Cube may drop Void Orb, then find Doom Star Altar to summon boss Doom Star.
Please check out more creatures on Side Quests - Battle Master.
Equip the Void Traveler suit and right-click on the Doom Star Altar to obtain the Glowscreen Forest Portal Igniter.
ftbquests.chapter.0C80A5748A662C54.title: Shadowlands
ftbquests.chapter.0E658DFD921E1C61.quest: You can use shaders as you wish, but the invading sky effect is not compatible with it. It's best not to use shaders to better experience the invasion.
About Shader Packs

Lucky block, Desert Lucky block, Fire Lucky block, Lucky Block Pink, Water Lucky Block, Summer Lucky Block,Among Us Lucky Block,Elemental Lucky Blocks, Energy Element Lucky Block, Heat Element Lucky Block, Morbius Lucky Block, Wind Element Lucky Blocks, Frost Element Lucky Block, and Lucky World Invasion Lucky Block(custom Lucky Block)
What are the lucky blocks

The Lucky Block will naturally spawn in your world, and across all dimensions. It may also generate within special structures, indicating how positive the outcome is likely to be. And you can modify the 'luck' of the block (or any of the Lucky Items) by combining it with certain other items in a crafting table. This will skew the probability of getting positive/negative outcomes.
The gameplay of lucky blocks

Invasion types are divided into primary invasion, secondary invasion, super invasion, and nightmare invasion, and time is divided into daytime invasion and nighttime invasion. When invasion occurs, the primary invasion will be the main invasion, followed by multiple secondary invasions as the severity increases. Super invasion will strengthen the creature (red border), with higher severity. Nightmare invasion is the most difficult invasion, and mobs will receive stronger reinforcement (purple border). You can view the current invasion information in the chat bar, and the level and rarity indicate the possible time and probability of invasion.

The first invasion will occur after 5 days (nighttime invasion), and then there will be one daytime or nighttime invasion within the set number of days (bad luck is a whole day invasion). Invasion unable to fall asleep during this period, as time goes on, there will be opportunities for higher-level intrusions, even super invasions and nightmare invasions, which will be automatically cancelled every once in a while (giving you rest time). Different dimensions will have different invasion cycles and types.
About invasion

The AI of the mobs has been strengthened. They will throw the Ender Pearl to pursue players, use fishing rods to catch players, etc. Of course, they will also destroy blocks. However, depending on the tools in their hands, Difficulty will affect the monster's health, speed, and attack.

The difficulty value increases over time, averaging 0.5 per day, The difficulty value is also linked to the dimension. Players cannot enter the corresponding dimension without reaching the specified difficulty level. Players are required to have a certain survival time. If you die, the difficulty value will automatically decrease.
About difficulty
Players who are not yet familiar with it can collect the guide here.
Get Mod Guidebook

When a player breaks a lucky block with Silk Touch, there is a chance that a lucky block event will be triggered. The countdown to the event will be displayed on the left side of the screen. After the countdown ends, a player from the server will be randomly selected to trigger the event. Only lucky blocks that are not in the list will be added to the queue.
The level of Silk Touch will affect the probability of events, and by default, level 10 is 100% triggered.
About lucky block event
Champion affixes description
Adaptable - Champion will take less and less damage from the same consecutive damage type.
Arctic - Continuously fires homing projectiles that will slow anyone they hit.
Enkindling - Continuously fires homing projectiles that will damage and burn anyone they hit.
Dampening - Reduces the damage of indirect attacks.
Desecrating - Periodically spawns a cloud of harming underneath its target.
Hasty - Drastically increases movement speed.
Infested - Attacking and being attacked will spawn silverfish that will attack its target.
Paralyzing - Small chance per attack to 'jail' targets, making them unable to move positions for a few seconds.
Knocking - Increased knockback from attacks, which will also slow targets for a small period of time.
Lively - Regenerates 1 health per second. This increases to 5 health per second when not attacking or pursuing any targets.
Molten - Grants fire resistance, fiery attacks, and armor penetration.
Plagued - Infects nearby creatures with a Poison effect.
Reflective - A small portion of damage is reflected back at the attacker
Wounding - Attacks will have a moderate chance to inflict the Wound effect, which decreases healing and increases damage taken.
Shielding - Periodically shields itself from all damage.
Magnetic - Periodically pulls targets towards itself.

ftbquests.chapter.1F0309125C22C0DF.title: Vellium
ftbquests.chapter.244F72D6CE564C7E.quest: Take action as soon as possible to search for Lucky Block and obtain various equipment. Be prepared before the invasion, but be careful of the explosion of Lucky Block. It is recommended to prioritize obtaining accessories that can increase the range of Lucky Block.

There are many basic to advanced props here Of course, before everything starts, it is recommended that you open the button settings to familiarize yourself with the key positions and set the appropriate key positions for yourself.

The monsters in this world have been strengthened and have gained certain PVP abilities. For example, those holding digging tools can dig the blocks they can reach the player's position. If the player is at a high altitude, they will also summon Phantom to help them approach the player. In the water, they will also summon Guardians to help. Some monsters also carry Ender Pearl, which can instantly approach the player from a distance.
In such a harsh living environment, being ambushed is inevitable, so your priority should be protection and evasion, not attack.

For beginners, even with lucky blocks in the early stages, survival is not easy. You need to familiarize yourself with some locations that are not easily attacked by monsters, settle down there, and prepare teleportation tools or increase your mobility before the first invasion to ensure that you can avoid monster attacks.

When you have a stable foothold, you can start accumulating resources to make the items you need for survival when your equipment is strong enough, you can start kill much monsters to collect some drops and tasks to obtain better accessories and equipment.
If you find that you can't defeat mobs, then you need to consider better equipment. If you feel that you are stronger, you can try to brush off the side quests of Battle Master.
Start your survival
Source: Bitominous Coal Ore.
Wreck
Set effect: Climb4+Night Vision
Single effect(Any): Climb4
Arrange the corresponding material block in the shape of an Iron Golem, and finally use the Guardian block to replace the pumpkin position to summon the corresponding puppet.
Some mobs do not need to be specifically searched for, and opportunities for challenges can be obtained through quest in the future.
In the overworld, you only need to consider the following two bosses:
&bBoom Boom -- Mushroom Kingdom&r
&bWither Skeleton Commander -- Shadowlands&r
Please check out more creatures on Side Quests - Battle Master.
Hunting
A guardian robot that can help you fight.
Complete the Glowing Crystal quest to obtain summoning items.
Set effect: Speed+Resistance+Curing
Single effect(Any): Speed+Resistance
Set effect: None, Any item can have an immune freezing effect
Set effect: Thorns+Regeneration, Can climb walls
Single effect(Any): Thorns
Set effect: Resistance+Haste+Power2
Single effect(Any): Haste
Set effect: Speed+Dolphin's Grace10+Resistance+Respiration+Night Vision
Single effect(helmet|chestplate|leggings|boots): Night Vision|Respiration|Resistance|Speed、Dolphin's Grace10
Set effect: Resistance+Power3
Single effect(Any): Resistance
Set +20 maximum health, early stage divine equipment.
Set effect: Speed+Resistance2+Jump Boost
Single effect(Any): Speed
Set effect: Respiration2+Night Vision2+Conduit Power3+Jump Boost3+Speed+Slow Falling2+Dolphin's Grace4
Single effect(helmet|chestplate|leggings|boots): Respiration2+Night Vision2|Conduit Power3|Jump Boost3|Speed+Slow Falling2
After entering the water, boots can obtain a one minute flight buff, which can create flight

After being hit by a water ball, you will experience drowning effect, which is characterized by being able to breathe underwater and unable to breathe on land. If you are hit by damp, you need to pay attention to this state or use milk to clear it.
It can also extinguish fires.
As an important armor, a shield can help you resist some damage, especially explosions.
A shield that can defend and attack, with high durability.
Here are some ores or special materials displayed.
Minerals and Mining
Ender Pearl is an important material and can also be used for rapid teleportation and escape, but it can cause minor damage and should not be used when the health is low.
Empty handed shift+right-click to modify the name of the location.
Waystone
Used to upgrade the capacity of backpacks.
Do you feel familiar with this structure? Yes, it's Mario's Castle with a painting inside. Where does it lead to?
Tip: You need to kill Boom Boom to obtain the Power Star right-click painting in order to activate the teleportation function.
Find the Brick Castle
Source: Kill Boom Boom.
Right click on the ice or water source to obtain 16 water balls.
Here are some items that are helpful for survival, as well as some necessary material collections.
Collection and create
Backpacks can help you solve the problem of insufficient space in your inventory.
Backpack

The sleeping bag has the function of implantation, but it does not set a respawn point. If you find a home, it is recommended to put the bed at home and set a respawn point, and then take the sleeping bag out for exploration to skip the night.
Sleeping Bag
Mainly used for loading storage network blocks to ensure the normal use of wireless terminals.
Guns can also be obtained through quest or gun lucky blocks.
All fears stem from insufficient firepower
Are you still worried about sorting and organizing chests? Build a storage network to facilitate the management of your items.

Using filter cables can set the priority of different containers to prevent unreasonable space utilization. At the same time, you also need to avoid the situation where one container is connected to multiple cables, as this will double the number of items displayed on the terminal.
Right click on a network controller binding.
Source: It can be obtained through pirate ships or mining.
Here are some structures for players to explore, with special purposes or necessary loot.
Exploration and discovery
Run map artifact.
A magical flowerpot that can help crops ripen quickly. Try planting carrots, potatoes, and beets on it for a different harvest.
The warden alive here, along with various rich treasure chests, coexists with danger.
Ancient City
You don't need obsidian to quickly reach the Nether. It will teleport you to the corresponding height. Be careful not to fall.
Sometimes you may see a ship on the sea surface, be careful of the pirates on board, but there are key materials for synthesizing the Water Lucky Block inside the ship.
Also, don't forget to search the wooden barrels under the captain's cabin seats.
Ancient City
In the depths of the sea or through the Water Lucky Block.
A pirate boat
Water buckets can help you avoid falling injuries, and at the same time, they can also play an important role in some traps.
If possible, it is recommended to prepare more milk because you don't know when you will encounter fatal negative effects, and milk can help you clear them in a timely manner.
A bed can be used to set a respawn point. It is recommended to make a bed before you find a suitable home to avoid unexpected death. The respawn point may be too far away.
Of course, it is also an important prop for skipping the night, provided that there is no invasion. Currently, the time displayed on the mini map shows that you can fall asleep after 18:33.
The bed can also be used to blow up the Netherite in Nether. Of course, don't think about using it use to the Ender Dragon.
Bed
Source: Aquamarine Ore.
Set effect: Respiration3+Night Vision3+Resistance+Step Up3+Slow Falling2+Dolphin's Grace
Single effect(helmet|chestplate|leggings|boots): Respiration3|Resistance|Step Up3|Speed
Boots can open up 6*6*6 ocean fields, allowing for swimming, equivalent to slow free flight.
The set comes with powerful attributes and can be used as equipment for later use.

Sometimes you may see altar like structures on the sea surface or even on land. It's best not to approach them in the early stages of survival, as a large amount of damps will accumulate nearby. If accidentally hit, it can cause drowning and make it difficult for you to breathe on land.
Damp Temple
A small structure usually located on the seabed, with a certain number of Tritons nearby.
Triton Temple
Summon Gold Wither Skeleton.
Source: Gold Wither Skeleton.
Storage category
Survival category
Source: Amethyst Cave.
Special category
A life-saving artifact that can be installed multiple times in the curios.
Set effect: Respiration3+Saturation3+Curing+Resistance3+Regeneration3+Power3+Step Up+Absorption3+Fire Resistance3+Speed3+Slow Falling+Jump Boost3+Dolphin's Grace+Night Vision3
Single effect(helmet|chestplate|leggings|boots): Respiration3+Saturation3+Curing|Resistance3+Regeneration3+Power3|Step Up+Absorption3+Fire Resistance3|Speed3+Slow Falling+Jump Boost3
With its powerful buff kit, it is equipped as a god in the later stage and is basically fearless of invasion.
Right click to launch water balloons and lightning.
Find a hollow log and crawl inside.
Set effect: Speed+Lucky5+Respiration+Haste
Single effect(Any): Speed+Respiration+Haste
Source: Beach.
Recommended for use in combination, of course, the Harpoon can also be used alone.
Protective category
Attack category
auxiliary category
Right click to launch a water ball.
From Water Lucky Block.
A pair of shoes that can increase speed by 85%, with Step Up effect, allowing for quick passage through rough terrain.
The creeper are afraid they will treat you like their own kind.
Right click to launch lightning.
Can generate rainbow glass under your feet, which is equivalent to soaring to the top, but comes with Slowness2, which is not suitable for running maps.
Shift can descend from glass.
Hit mobs can have various negative effects.
Press the G key to launch a large number of water balls.
Set effect: None
Although there are no additional buffs, the built-in attributes are also good in the early stages.
Having a long reach.
A magical potion that can obtain mobs abilities.
Need bottles and Capacity Thief.
Source: Beach.
Set effect: None
Used for create curios.
These curios can be create.
Pressing Y can fly.
Jetpack!
It will actually cause damage of 4.75~15.75.
Source: Near the underwater coral reefs.
Launching ignited TNT.

ftbquests.chapter.285BBB7AC0649BDF.quest: Monster Manual
Description
Difficulty Stage: Normal
BOSS in the attack by the Undead Army.
Difficulty Stage: Normal
Difficulty Stage: Difficulty
Be careful when opening loot chests.
Difficulty Stage: Normal
BOSS in the attack by the Undead Army.
Difficulty Stage: Difficulty
BOSS in the attack by the Undead Army.
Difficulty Stage: Master
This is a special faction that usually unlocks with increasing difficulty stages (non difficulty values) and appears in undead legion attacks.
Manually trigger using the Undead Army Flag (Only Overworld).
&6When entering other dimensions for the first time: Activate Difficulty Stage&r
&cWhen Killing the Ender Dragon: Activate Expert Stage&r
Undead Army
giant?

Creeper is probably a headache inducing mobs. They often appear in front of you unintentionally and squander your wealth. They have also gained the ability to project themselves, so be careful not to give you a coolie who is afraid of breaking a cannon!
Creeper faction
Usually, they only shoot with crossbows and can directly approach them by moving to avoid attacks.
They will summon Vex that can fly through walls and use magic attacks, which are difficult to deal with, but they are one of the sources of totems.
Pillagers with an axe is also fast, it is recommended to launch a long-range attack.
Pillagers are the opposite of villagers and often launch attacks on villages.
Pillager faction
Spiders have the ability to spit webs, don't think they will only slowly approach and attack you. Of course, they are also good mounts, occasionally bringing a teammate to fight with you.
Spider faction

The Guardians usually live in the Ocean Temple and use lasers to lock onto players and cause damage. Players can avoid locking by isolating them with blocks, and the abilities of different Guardians also vary.
Guardian faction
Usually they only appear on pirate ships.
Made by drowning a skeleton in water.
Although they have the same name, they are not bosses.
Witches in this world are not easy to deal with. They are masters of potions, so it's best not to tug at them and use powerful attacks to quickly defeat them.
Master gathering place, with bosses for early to late challenges and some special creatures.
Other factions

Almost the strongest boss, immune to all negative states, with extremely fast speed and high armor, as well as a bunch of buffs. Most weapons are difficult to damage it, and it can be opened through the Water Lucky Block.
A powerful BOSS that can be opened through the Water Lucky Block.
A very strong mob, never approach them, but fortunately they do not naturally grow.
It will appear during the invasion.

Skeletons usually use bows and arrows to shoot, and with the support of AI, they are all skilled marksmen. Try moving to avoid as much as possible, and do not expose them to places that are easily attacked.
Skeleton faction
Be careful of the Ghast version bomber.
Zombies usually only attack close range, but now they can use fishing rods to catch players, so be careful to avoid them.
Zombie faction
Yellow.
ftbquests.chapter.285BBB7AC0649BDF.title: Battle Master
ftbquests.chapter.32F501713036A4F4.quest: This is a modpack with a theme of lucky blocks and invasions. The Ender Dragon is very powerful, and you need to prepare sufficient weapons to go to The End to defeat it. However, before that, you may face sleepless invasions.
·Using Skyblock Builder created a unique racing map, so you don't need to download the world to your save
·Invasion system adds challenges and fun to players' exploration of lucky blocks
·More curios and QoL features improve gaming experience
·Using the Tacz gun system to provide players with an immersive FPS experience and improve FPS skills
·Special mobs AI can improve players' PVP skills or teamwork abilities

ftbquests.chapter.3E17CA3251E05EA9.quest: The accessories above have a chance to be drawn from different loot chests, or can be randomly obtained by killing monsters.

On the left is a growable relic. Press shift to view the conditions for obtaining relic experience, manually upgrade skills, or spend player experience to reset quality. Relics have a chance to be drawn from different loot chests.

The accessory on the right will have accessory slots. If you obtain accessory slots during survival, you can place them on a workbench and install them in the available slots. These accessories are usually obtained by killing mobs.
The following accessories are synthesized step by step from basic accessories, please see JEI's instructions.

ftbquests.chapter.4428548C42F3D842.quest: Glowbloom Forest is filled with glowing mushrooms, but be careful not all mushrooms will just stay in place and welcome guests to visit This dimension also inhabits Jellyfish and Spore Mines (inspired by Warhammer 40K) that can sting people. Spore Mines may seem harmless, but if you accidentally approach them, they can cause an explosion without warning Of course, there are countless towers and dungeons waiting for players to explore here.
Toxic Spore can be extracted from underwater dungeon loot blocks.
Please check out more creatures on Side Quests - Battle Master.
Killing Acid Snail will generate snail acid, collect it by right clicking on the Containment Box.
You can find the Blood Key in a chest on top of a structure.

ftbquests.chapter.6219C60DCF76D0C0.quest: A maid can not only help you fight, but also do many things. Here we will tell you how to get a capable maid.
&cPay attention to distinguishing between maids and maid fairies. Only maids can be tamed with cakes, and maid fairies are hostile creatures.&r
Used to set the working and resting places for maids.
Please build the altar according to the tutorial book and remember that the P points are sufficient for synthesis.
Tutorial book location: Multi block altar. Click on the eye in the bottom left corner of the structure diagram in the tutorial book to switch on and off the display structure projection.
Handheld, you can view the player's P-points (top left corner), which is also a necessary tool for building altars.

Right click on a creature to copy its ID, When switching to attack mode, the second tab above can configure the list of creatures. Paste the copied tag into the input box and click add to configure the behavior towards this creature. The default is to automatically attack all hostile creatures. If you don't want the maid to attack a creature, set it to neutral or friendly.

Right click to obtain P points, which are used for altar synthesis and generally do not require extensive use. The maximum P points that players can store are 5 points, and any excess points need to be stored in the &bShrine Court Lamp&r.
Used to revive the maid in the film, please note that it will also consume the player's health to 1 point. Do not do this operation in dangerous environments.
The way to obtain a figurine is to ignite it around the statue with a flint or other ignition tool, and after a moment, you can get the corresponding figurine.
ftbquests.chapter.6219C60DCF76D0C0.title: Maid trainer
